author: Mike Stobbe / AP
title: Why Some Doctors Are Now Moving Away From Ventilator Treatments for Coronavirus Patients
description: As health officials around the world push for more ventilators, some doctors are moving away from using the breathing machines when they can
content: (NEW YORK) — As health officials around the world push to get more ventilators to treat coronavirus patients, some doctors are moving away from using the breathing machines when they can. The reason: Some hospitals have reported unusually high death rates for… [+6619 chars]
